articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Greek Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Greek Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Petros Avierinos, new Greek ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 After receiving credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed 
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to mark the 30th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Implement the Socialist Labor Law Thoroughly". 
					 Present there were Premier Kim Yong Il, Vice-Premiers Ro Tu Chol and O Su Yong, Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Pak Nam Gi, leading officials of ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations and officials in the field of labor administration. 
					
					 The participants heard the recorded speech "Let Us Implement the Socialist Labor Law Thoroughly‚Äù made by the President at the national conference of labor administration officials. 
					
					 Clarified in the work published on Sept. 27, Juche 68 (1979) are the need for the labor administration officials to do political work, work with people well, the matters of encouraging all the working people to have love for work and work as required by the socialist labor regulations, abiding by the principle of socialist distribution, strictly enforcing the socialist system of paying for the work done and thoroughly implementing the mass line in the labor administration and other issues. 
					
					 O Su Yong said in his report that the work is a great programme for the socialist labor administration run through with the Juche-oriented principle and methods and serves as guidelines to be held fast to in improving and strengthening labor administration in the whole period of socialist construction.
					
					Referring to the fact that the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il have wisely led the labor administration to serve the purpose of fully meeting the independent requirements and interests of the working masses, the reporter stressed that under the wise leadership of the party and the leader the originality and validity of the idea and theory of the socialist labor administration have been clearly proved and their vitalities fully displayed and great progress has been made in the labor administration.
					
					 He called for bringing about a fresh turn in the socialist labor administration, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il to make a positive contribution to building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Golden Jubilee of FTB
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Golden Jubilee of FTB
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the Cabinet of the DPRK at Okryu Restaurant Thursday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the Foreign Trade Bank. 
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of various countries on visits to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of the birthday of the bank, staff members of the foreign embassies here and other foreigners staying in the DPRK.
					
					 Vice-Premier O Su Yong said in his speech that the bank was founded by President Kim Il Sung and has developed into an able one which plays an important role in the development of national economy and wages brisk financial activities for foreign trade under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the bank would boost cooperation and business transaction with banks of foreign countries and thus make steady progress in foreign financial dealings.

articles.title: Golden Jubilee of FTB Celebrated
articles.content:
Golden Jubilee of FTB Celebrated
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The 50th anniversary of the founding of the Foreign Trade Bank was significantly celebrated in the DPRK.
					 Established in Juche 48 (1959), the bank has conducted settlement with other countries and financial transactions in a uniform manner as required by the nation's developing external economic relations.
					
					 The bank has boosted its business relations and satisfactorily ensured settlement with banks of various countries, laying a groundwork for developing the nation's external economic relations including foreign trade. 
					
					 The bank has further boosted its business capability and improved international confidence as required by the times when the country's international prestige and economic potential are rising remarkably and made a brisk way into international financial markets, steadily expanding the business relations with various other banks of the world on the principle of independence, equality and mutual benefit.
					
					 A meeting celebrating the golden jubilee of the FTB was held in Pyongyang Thursday.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of various countries participating in the celebrations of the golden jubilee of the bank, staff members of embassies of foreign countries here and foreign guests staying in the DPRK.
					
					 O Kwang Chol, president of the bank, delivered a report at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Cuba
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Cuba
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government economic delegation headed by Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, left here Thursday to take part in the 28th meeting of the DPRK and Cuba inter-governmental economic, scientific and technological consultative committee to be held in Cuba.

articles.title: Plenary Meeting of C.C., UAWK Held
articles.content:
Plenary Meeting of C.C., UAWK Held
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The 58th plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) was held in Thaechon County, North Phyongan Province, on Thursday. 
					 Present at the plenary meeting were members of the Central Committee of the UAWK and officials of the union in Pyongyang and local areas. 
					
					 The plenary meeting discussed the tasks facing the UAWK organizations to dynamically conduct the 100-day campaign in the same spirit as displayed during the 150-day campaign for bringing about a radical turn in the drive to build a thriving nation. 
					
					 A report of Kang Chang Uk, chairman of the C.C., the UAWK, was followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers proposed the tasks facing the UAWK organizations to fully enlist the mental power of the agricultural workers through the high-pitched 100-day campaign and wage the drive for successfully concluding the farming for this year and ways to do so.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Korea Stamp Corporation has recently published two kinds of individual stamps reflecting the superior public health system of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Mirrored in the stamps are the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and the feature of a baby enjoying benefits of free medical care since birth.
					
					 Meanwhile, it has brought out eight kinds of individual stamps dealing with fishes and amphibians inhabiting Korea and other countries.

articles.title: New Book Off Press
articles.content:
New Book Off Press
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out the book "Collection of Materials on Revolutionary History of Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" (Vol. 10) compiled by the Party History Institute of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The book deals with the materials on the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung from November of Juche 25 (1936) to early July of Juche 26 (1937).
					
					 The first part of the book carries what Kim Il Sung said recollecting the period when he frustrated the Japanese imperialists' "great punitive operation in winter," consolidated the base in Mt. Paektu and led the advance of the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the homeland with a main emphasis on its expedition to Fusong and the Pochonbo battle.
					
					 The second part of the book carries reminiscences of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters telling about the greatness of the President they grasped through practical struggles.
					
					 Its third part introduces articles carried by publications at home and abroad and contents of confidential documents of the army, police and special service of the Japanese imperialists and the puppet "Manchukuo" on battles commanded by the President and activities of the KPRA.
					
					 The book has an appendix which introduces publications on the anti-Japanese patriotic struggle of the Korean people which mounted under the influence of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and enemy documents dealing with the colonial predatory policy pursued by the Japanese imperialists and their moves to exterminate the Korean nation and their "punitive operations" against the KPRA in that period.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestler Wins World Title
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestler Wins World Title
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestler Yang Kyong Il bagged a gold medal in the 55kg division freestyle match in the 2009 world wrestling championship.
					 He eliminated his Mongolian, British and Kazakh rivals in preliminary matches and trounced his Belorussian rival in the semi-finals. He faced a Turkish wrestler in the finals.
					
					 He beat his rival 2-1 by displaying such high technique as ankle and leg takedown.

articles.title: Remains of People Massacred during Korean War Buried
articles.content:
Remains of People Massacred during Korean War Buried
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Remains of more than 170 people massacred by class enemies by murderous order of the U.S. imperialists in the period of strategic temporary retreat during the last Fatherland Liberation War were buried in Jangbang-ri, Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province.
					 Even women and children were among those patriots and inhabitants who met tragic death.
					
					 A ceremony of burying the remains took place on Thursday.
					
					 The participants placed wreaths before the tomb and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 They looked round the tomb and a pit, the scene of massacre.

articles.title: First Statue of President Kim Il Sung Erected in Korea
articles.content:
First Statue of President Kim Il Sung Erected in Korea
						
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- There stands in the campus of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School a statue of President Kim Il Sung, who led the brutal Japanese imperialist troops one million strong by the nose, with field-glasses in one hand and with his white mantle flying in the wind.
					The statue is the first of its kind in Korea which was built on the initiative of an anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					
					She saw to it that children of revolutionary martyrs who fell in the anti-Japanese war were sought before her family and relatives after the liberation of the country and visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School frequently to take warm care of their study and life.
					
					The bereaved children always longed for the President, calling him father. Seeing through their mind, she initiated the construction of the statue and guided the project energetically.
					
					At that time Wang Yi-zhi, wife of Chinese Zhou Bao-zhong related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, visited the DPRK and went round the school. Deeply moved to see that the school children followed her calling her mother, Wang told her that it would be good to build her statue in the school.
					
					However, she told her to the following effect: We must not do so. These are the real children of the General who will uphold him as their parents did. A statue of General Kim Il Sung should be erected in the school, which will give greater pleasure to the school-children.
					
					When the new school buildings were under construction, she came there again. She solved all the problems arising in the construction of the statue, saying to officials that the children wanted to meet the General and always live in his bosom and that they should let the school-children live, looking up to the image of the General anytime by building his statue there.
					
					She did her best to construct his statue on the highest plane and made a frequent visit to the construction site, carrying with her vegetables and fruits she had cultivated by herself.
					
					It was on October 24, Juche 37 (1948) that the statue of the President was erected in the campus of the school as the first of its kind in Korea amid her overcautious loving care.
					
					Kim Jong Suk made all her efforts to implant in the minds of the bereaved children of revolutionaries the faith that they would trust and follow only President Kim Il Sung and stoutly bring up the generation of the Songun revolution. 
					
					„ÄÄHer exploits, indeed, will shine long in the annals of the country.

articles.title: Military Exchange between China and DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Military Exchange between China and DPRK Called for 
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Xu Caihou, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission who is member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, met and had a friendly talk with the military delegation of the Korean People's Army headed by Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, on a visit to China at the August 1 Building in Beijing on Wednesday.
					 Xu Caihou said that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship is common wealth provided by Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai of China and President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, adding that the party, government and army of China have consistently set store by the Sino-DPRK friendship on a strategic level and made efforts to develop it. 
					
					 Noting that the armies of the two countries have conducted wide-ranging exchange and cooperation in various fields, thus making a great contribution to the development of the relations between the two countries, he underscored the need to expand and develop in depth the exchange between the armies of China and the DPRK at present. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve fresh successes in developing the economy, improving the standard of people's living and ensuring the security of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked 
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Receptions, photo exhibitions and film shows were held at the DPRK embassies in Laos, Nepal, Iran, India, Thailand, Bangladesh, Nigeria, Uganda, Uzbekistan, the Czech Republic, Poland and Austria between Sept. 1 and 8 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on their glorious revolutionary history and exploits and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran praised the founder of the DPRK Kim Il Sung as the greatest man recognized by the world as he defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 The leader of the Party for Thailand said that the DPRK founded by Kim Il Sung has achieved great successes in the fields of politics, economy and culture, adding that the history of modern Korea would be unthinkable apart from the august name of the President.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung noted that the DPRK is making a dynamic advance to open the gate to a thriving socialist nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President, thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il. He wished the Korean people success in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched "The Faith of Korea", "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.

articles.title: Xu Caihou subraya necesidad de ampliar intercambio military
articles.content:
Xu Caihou subraya necesidad de ampliar intercambio militar
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente de la Comision Militar del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Xu Caihou, departio el dia 23 en la sede 1 de Agosto de Beijing en un ambiente amistoso con la delegacion militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea presidida por el viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Pak Jae Gyong, de visita en China.
					  En la ocasion, el vicepresidente dijo que la tradicional amistad China-Corea es el tesoro comun preparado por el Presidente Mao Zedong, el primer ministro Zhou Enlai de China y por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, gran Lider del pueblo coreano, y subrayo que el partido, el gobierno y el ejercito de China tratan invariablemente en la altura estrategica la amistad China-Corea y se esfuerzan por su desarrollo.
					
					  Prosiguio que los ejercitos de los dos paises realizaron el intercambio y la cooperacion amplios en varias esferas e hicieron gran aporte al desarrollo de las relaciones de ambos paises y senalo la necesidad de ampliar en la actualidad el intercambio entre los ejercitos binacionales y profundizar su contenido.
					
					  Expreso la conviccion de que bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il el pueblo coreano lograra nuevos exitos en el desarrollo de la economia, la mejora de la vida del pueblo y el mantenimiento de la seguridad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador griego
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador griego
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Petros Avierinos presento el dia 24 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Grecia en Corea.
					    Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang delegacion economica de RPDC hacia Cuba
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang delegacion economica de RPDC hacia Cuba
						
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La delegacion economica gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el ministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, partio el dia 24 de esta capital para asistir a la 28a sesion de la Comision de Consulta Economica, Cientifico-Tecnica entre los gobiernos de la RPDC y la Republica de Cuba a efectuarse en este pais.

articles.title: Banquete por 50o aniversario de fundacion del Banco Comercial
articles.content:
Banquete por 50o aniversario de fundacion del Banco Comercial
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio este jueves en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en ocasion del 50o aniversario de la fundacion del Banco Comercial.
					A la comida fueron invitados las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises participantes en el acto por esa efemeride, los miembros de las embajadas de diversos paises acreditados en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros que permanecen en nuestro pais.
					
					El vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros O Su Yong, al hacer uso de la palabra, senalo que bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Banco Comercial fundado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung cumple un rol importante en el desarrollo de la economia nacional y ha sido desarrollado como un banco credencial que libra dinamicas actividades monetarias con el extranjero.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que el Banco Comercial lograra el desarrollo continuo en la labor monetaria con el extranjero ampliando la cooperacion y las transacciones con los bancos de muchos paises del mundo.
